name: UnDice-Sicious
description:
Welcome to unDice-sicious ! In this game you will play the famous dice game 421, but instead or rerolling your dices, you have access to quantuum universes where you made a differents rolls, and you can switch dices between universe to maximise you scores.
In each board/universe, you willroll 3 dice, you can then drag dices between board to switch them nad try to make a figure worth more than your initial roll. This is a high score game,  everytime you clear a board you win points, if you don't clear the board in a certain time window you will lose.

This game was made by 4 computer science student, using Godot Engine. this game fits  the jam theme because we roll dice (creativity at its peak)
